data.title: Umaru Musa ar adua University Katsina – To Learn & To Serve
data.text:
Disclaimer on UMYU Post-UTME 2024 registration

The Registrar of Umaru Musa Yar’adua University is informing all members of the Institution’s Community that a fake and dubious information on the conduct of year 2024 Post-UTME for UTME […]

Disclaimer

It has come to our attention that unauthorized individual(s) are using the name and picture of the Vice-Chancellor of Umaru Musa Yar’adua University Katsina Prof. Shehu Salihu Muhammad on Facebook. […]
